user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (lisa.caregiver@example.com) with some insights about Ethan to help me get started. Remind her to check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me an email (lisa.caregiver@example.com) with any insights or key details about Ethan that would help me get started? It would be wonderful to understand his routines, preferences, communication style, and anything else you feel is important.

If it’s convenient, please check your Notion workspace for any notes or resources you’ve already gathered on Ethan and include or reference them in your email.

Thank you so much for your help—I really appreciate it!

Best regards,
Lisa

final_output:
